title: GameFace lets you control a computer with your face - yes, a feel-good AI story
description: A quadriplegic streamer lost everything in a fire, now AI technology is giving something physical back to him

title: New leak shows Garmin ready to push the limits on wearable battery life
description: Garmin's Fenix 7 line will get two new pro models with options for solar charging and a sapphire glass display.

title: The best web browser just got an update to make it even better
description: Mozilla Firefox's latest update significantly improves on accessibility in a major way.

title: 7 upgrades I want to see on the rumored iMac 2023
description: The 2021 iMac was great but flawed. Apple can make it better with these seven updates.

title: MSI's new Bravo gaming laptops could give Acer and HP a run for their money
description: MSI launched its refreshed Bravo series of gaming laptops with current-gen CPUs and GPUs, something that should make manufacturers like Acer and HP look twice.

title: NAD’s new amp is a retro wonder with wireless high-res audio streaming and HDMI
description: The design of NAD's C 3050 looks back to hi-fi's glory days, but inside is a thoroughly modern steaming amplifier

title: Turkey elections: how likely is an information blackout?
description: As citizens are getting ready to head to the polls this weekend, experts recommend getting a Turkey VPN to bypass potential disruptions. Here's all you need to know.

title: Apple under probe in Italy over alleged data privacy rules misconduct
description: Italy's antitrust watchdog accuses Apple of abusing its market dominance by applying more restrictive privacy policies to third-party apps.

title: Brazil threatens to ban Telegram VPN
description: The move comes after Telegram warned that 'democracy is under attack in Brazil' as VPN interest grows across the region amid temporary blocks.

title: The Panasonic Lumix S5 IIX’s video smarts put the Sony A7 IV in the shade
description: Panasonic has officially announced the S5 IIX and it’s a near-identical version of the S5 II, but with a bounty of advanced video features.

title: Microsoft is working on a mega security patch for some of its most crucial issues
description: Microsoft's project is going to take almost a year to complete but when it's done, it should address the BlackLotus bootkit.

title: B&O launches the world's 2nd 97-inch OLED TV, and it's much cooler than LG's
description: The 97-inch Beovision Harmony OLED has just been unveiled by luxury audio brand Bang & Olufsen, as a seriously elite home theater option.

title: If you use Linux - watch out for this stealthy new malware
description: A known Linux malware has gotten a major upgrade that makes it invisible to AV programs - for now.

title: 7 new movies and TV shows on Netflix, Prime Video, Disney Plus and more this weekend (May 12)
description: From star-studded Hollywood biopics to new Netflix thrillers, there’s plenty to watch this weekend.

title: Windows 11 might be getting this Xbox Series X feature - and it's literally game-changing
description: Hint about Quick Resume coming for PC gamers adds more fuel to the rumor bonfire around Microsoft’s ‘handheld mode’.

title: Second Android 14 beta will let you know when your app is sending location info
description: Android 14 will feature enhanced privacy protection plus the introduction of a new HDR format for better image quality.

title: The next major Windows 11 update is coming soon – but could disappoint
description: While the next update – which looks like it’s ‘Moment 3’ – does a lot, it doesn’t usher in any big changes.

title: Audio Editing simplified with Wondershare Filmora AI
description: Video and audio editing almost always go hand-in-hand — which is likely why Wondershare Filmora 12 has introduced some new AI-driven features that make audio editing easier than ever.

title: One of the most popular WordPress plugins has a serious security flaw
description: An Elementor library, used by a million WordPress websites, allowed attackers to reset anyone's password.

title: Microsoft fixes serious Outlook security flaw, so patch now
description: Hackers have been successfully bypassing a previous Microsoft Outlook patch.

title: Look out, ChatGPT: this rival chatbot can now read a whole novel in under a minute
description: This rival AI, named Claude, has one big advantage over ChatGPT: a much longer memory.

title: Bad news - Microsoft Teams won't let you hide from horrible meetings any more
description: Microsoft Teams update will now give away your location, if you let it.

title: New Netflix series Black Knight is your next South Korean thriller obsession
description: This six-episode Netflix series takes place in a wasteland dystopia, where couriers known as Black Knights bring order to the chaos.

title: Final Fantasy 16 is taking accessibility seriously, showing off features in new trailer
description: Square Enix has unveiled a new trailer that shows off Story-Focused mode, offering accessible gameplay.

title: Google has just launched an AI music generator, here’s how to get access
description: Google has just launched MusicLM for a few lucky folks, here's how to get access to the music generator.

title: Amazon is creating more apprenticeships for SMEs
description: SMEs, creative partners and local authorities in England are getting more Amazon support to take on new apprentices.

title: Black Mirror season 6 will take humorous potshots at Netflix and its streaming rivals
description: The episode titles for Black Mirror season 6 have been revealed – and one of them directly mocks the streaming industry.

title: Meta is using AI to build the next generation of online ads
description: Meta wants to help advertisers offer variation and diversification with its new AI and automation tools.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Friday, May 12 (game #473)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.
